import React, { Component } from "react"; import logo from '../assets/img/logo.png'; import bck from '../assets/img/bck_2.png'; import prog_1 from '../assets/img/prog_1.png'; import prog_2 from '../assets/img/prog_2.png'; import prog_3 from '../assets/img/prog_3.png'; class Modal extends Component { render() { return (

{this.props.t('form.title')}

{this.props.t('form.subtitle_1')}
{this.props.t('form.subtitle_2')}

) } } export default Modal;
